name: @cekrause/next
description: An utility package to bootstrap a Next.js project.

scripts.bump:major: npm version major -m 'chore(release): v%s' && git push --follow-tags
scripts.bump:minor: npm version minor -m 'chore(release): v%s' && git push --follow-tags
scripts.bump:patch: npm version patch -m 'chore(release): v%s' && git push --follow-tags
